title: more yasuo salt
body:
does anyone else feel like yasuo needs some modification? 
coming from a average player stand point (im only silver) but i feel like he is some what unbalanced. i think 1 or 2 minor changes could be effective just simple things like his e shouldn't be able to dash so often, or the windwall should not work both ways like if he throws it the wrong way he should get penalized for it not still block stuff? 

just my thoughts i think he could be slightly changed

replies.body:
Seriously we need talon12 again. WHERE ARE YOU TALON?? WHY DO YOU LET THESE YASUO HATERS RUN FREE????!?!?

Also I use to think that Yasuo was bullshit too but then I realised complaining about it's not gonna do anything because there has legitimately been hundreds of posts before you asking for the same thing. Also he's really not that bs after nerfs, just gotta bait out his wind wall then ez game ez life.

He was 100% broken up until the nerfs. Now he is in a very good spot. He doesn't pull damage out his ass, you see skilled Yasuos thrive and wannabee ones fail. He has the potential to be put behind now instead of dumb scaling, but he also has a very high skill cap for strong damage and outplays and a lot of variety.

Of course, I never lose to a Yasuo now only because I hate the champion with every part of my body, so I just get a camp on me and destroy him. He can't come back. I love bullying Yasuos. But yeah he is very well balanced for both roles now.

{{champion:157}} is a high skill champ so nerfs are not needed. {{champion:157}} can be locked down with hard cc. If your team is not taking a hard cc champ then you only have yourselves to blame. If you see {{champion:157}}  lock in then get {{champion:33}}.

A good {{champion:81}}  can shut down yas, I have seen it. 

There are counters for a reason.

LMFAO keep telling yourself kid yas highskill champ my ass!

Can get 100% crit easy
Refreshing SHIELD
Click to win Gap closer with 0 CD on minions 
KnockUP is pretty much the ONLY skill shot on him and even so you can get it up in no time

You have never played Yasuo. Go and play yas. Until then you cannot comment on how much skill yasuo requires to play.
Until you do you will never climb in ranked. Judging by your win/loss ration in ranked you are destined for bronze 2. It's taken me three years to start climbing in this game because I can learn the strength and weaknesses of a champ.
Stop being a noob and start playing champs to see what they are strong at and what they are weak at.
